attributes.comment:
This is in regards to increasing the cost of application fees of adoption petitions.
Currently the cost of adoption is VERY expensive and 66% increase in fees
proposed in this document just add more to the adoption. An increase of 66%
sows that there are potentially major problems in the processing of these
applications and should be inspected instead of ignoring hte problem and passing
the cost onto those people who are attempting to adopt and bring a new child into
the United States for a happy life. I strongly oppose such a sharp increase in
these fees. Please reconsider and inspect the need for this increase instead of
just passing it onto the new parents just wanting to adopt a child.

Thank you,
Ryan Burke

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Ryan Burke
